text:
On #NationalVaccinationDay2021, we urge you to register yourselves for your #Covid19 #vaccine, if you're eligible.

3.17 crore doses given, but still a long way to go.

☑️ Wear Masks,
☑️ Wash Hands,
☑️ Maintain Social Distance.
